suppress.notes: file name reason: false positive - this is for the github project TooTallNate/Java-WebSocket, not javax.websocket. see https://github.com/TooTallNate/Java-WebSocket/issues/1019#issuecomment-628507934
file name: tds-4.6.14-SNAPSHOT.war: ncwms-1.2.tds.4.6.12.jar reason: ncwms does not use trac libs. false positive.
file name example: godiva2/js/yui/treeview-min.js reason: These CVEs only impact the Flash component of YUI.

file name example: taglibs-standard-impl-1.2.5.jar reason: These CVEs are for a GO based project called tag (MP3/MP4/OGG/FLAC metadata parsing library). False positive. See https://github.com/dhowden/tag/issues/77 (from first CVE listed)
file name: jdom2-2.0.6.jar reason: mitigated by https://github.com/Unidata/thredds/pull/1368
file name: jdom-1.1.3.jar reason: mitigated by https://github.com/Unidata/thredds/pull/1368
file name: hibernate-validator-4.3.2.Final.jar reason: (CVE-2019-10219) we do not use the SafeHtml validator in this project. (CVE-2017-7536) vulnerability not introduced until 5.2.x
file name: spring-beans-4.3.29.RELEASE.jar reason: only vulnerable for JDK 9+

file name: spring-core-4.3.30.RELEASE.jar reason: (CVE-2016-1000027) this CVE does not point to a vulnerability in the project itself, it is a vulnerability that occurs with improper use of HTTPInvoker, which we do not use. (CVE-2022-22950) we do not use SpEL (CVE-2022-22965) only vulnerable for JDK 9+. (CVE-2022-22968) case sensitivity vulnerability in DataBinder disallowedFields, which we do not use (CVE-2022-22970) MultipartFiles ad javax.servlet.Part not used
file name: spring-context-4.3.30.RELEASE.jar reason: case sensitivity vulnerability in DataBinder disallowedFields, which we do not use
file name: spring-expression-4.3.30.RELEASE.jar reason: we do not use SpEL
file name: spring-web-4.3.30.RELEASE.jar reason: resolved CVE - only valid if using HTTPInvokerServiceExporter
file name: spring-webmvc-4.3.30.RELEASE.jar reason: (CVE-2020-5397) vulnerability introduce in 5.2.x
